byline.original: Correspondence of The New-York Daily Times

lead_paragraph: The Annual Fair of the Hampden Co. Agricultural Society has been in progress during yesterday and to-day, bringing together, as it usually does, a crowd of visitors. The number of entries in the different departments exhibits a steady and commendable increase over those of past years, and evinces a more thorough determination on the part of farmers to improve their knowledge in matters pertaining to agricultural science-a branch which has heretofore been sadly neglected.

headline.main: CONNECTICUT.; Hampden County Agricultural Fair and Exhibition of Mechanic Arts.
